scoringPlays.text: Tommy Mister 30 Yd Run (Christian Hagan Kick)
Shane Wimann 8 Yd pass from Marcus Childers (Christian Hagan Kick)
Quintin Morris 11 Yd pass from James Morgan (Jake Suder Kick)
Spencer Tears 15 Yd pass from Marcus Childers (Christian Hagan Kick)
Chad Beebe 73 Yd pass from Marcus Childers (Christian Hagan Kick)

videos.headline: Mister takes it 30 yards for TD
videos.description: Northern Illinois' running back Tommy Mister slices through the Bowling Green defense for a 30-yard touchdown run.

videos.headline: Childers finds a wide open Wimann
videos.description: Huskies QB Marcus Childers finds his TE Shane Wimann all alone in the endzone for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Morgan throws a bullet to Morris for TD
videos.description: Bowling Green QB James Morgan fits the touchdown pass into a tight window to his WR Quintin Morris in the first quarter.

videos.headline: Huskies defense forces turnover
videos.description: Northern Illinois' Trayshon Foster crushes Bowling Green QB Grant Loy who fumbles the  football.

videos.headline: Northern Illinois dominates in all phases of the game
videos.description: Michael Reghi and Jerod Cherry break down Northern Illinois' dominant performance as the Huskies win 48-17.
